about_the_game:
Be the ultimate strategy commander as you take part in a living, breathing galaxy shared by thousands of real players. Defend your territory and conquer neighboring planets by leading a vast armada of troops, aliens, creatures, vehicles, and heavy weaponry- all for the glory of your alliance.

ZeroSpace is the first ever RTS where all game modes (single-player, co-op, PvE, and PvP) are played inside a shared MMO galaxy map. Alliance battle lines can shift by the hour, as you contribute towards the war effort through conquering planets, fortifying strongholds, and defending your civilization. Play your way and be on the forefront of changes sweeping across this living galaxy. Wishlist ZeroSpace now to get updates when we launch!

A Persistent, Massively Multiplayer Galaxy Map

In Galactic War, you command a legion of troops stationed on your flagship. Coordinate alongside other alliance members to deploy troops on enemy planets, space stations and strongholds across the galaxy. On the ground, you must command your army to victory in order to gain influence, renown and to expand alliance territory.

  • Choose between single player, co-op, player-versus-environment(PvE) scenarios, player versus player(PvP), and special stronghold missions.

  • Target a planet to launch a mission to conquer or liberate territory for your chosen alliance. Planets may have different hazards, enemies, defenses and difficulties.

  • Choose a hero to lead your massive armies. Each hero has their own unique style. Side with Vynthra, a plant-like organism, to utilize their terraforming abilities, or do precision strikes with Mera in command of a veteran human task force. Level them up to gain access to unique technology, units, and even special missions. There are numerous heroes to and units to choose from.

  • Upgrade stronghold planets alongside your alliance with laser batteries, ion cannons and guardian shields that the enemy has to assault in order to get through.

An Epic Sci-fi story that sets up the Galactic Conflict

Make choices that change the universe, inspired by classic narrative RPGs like Mass Effect. Build deep relationships with your crew and the heroes you enlist during the campaign.

Unparalleled Strategic Depth

Construct a crushing strategy by combining over 80 units together, through 4 factions, 6 mercenaries and 14 heroes, making each match different and unlocking more opportunities for dynamic counterplay.

Skill Play Without The APM

3 years of testing our streamlined user interface with a variety of players allows you to have any ability at the tip of your fingers. You'll feel right at home with the ability to customize your set up like any other game you're used to. Want to draw your unit formation? Want the minimap on the left or right? Camera hotkeys and queued commands? Grid hotkeys or not? We've got you covered.

Campaign

Dive into a world teeming with mystery and danger. Traverse diverse planets aboard your upgradable mothership, guided by a choice-driven RPG system. Face moral quandaries: do you save a once-hostile planet or leave it to perish against formidable forces? As you journey, enhance your vessel, recruit heroes, and navigate complex relationships. Will some allies admire or despise you? Are you ready to lead mankind?

Command a diverse crew, each hailing from unique cultures. Engage them as mission companions, converse to uncover their histories, and embark on loyalty quests tailored to their personalities. Every hero crew member brings a distinct play style aligned with their character, enriching your tactical options.

Navigate an expansive galaxy map, brimming with dialogue opportunities and regions to explore or dominate.

Features & Content

  • An MMO Galaxy map with multiple game modes (Co-op, Single-player, PvE, 2vAI, 2v2, Scenarios and 1v1)

  • An singleplayer campaign with 13 main story missions, 14 hero loyalty missions, and 20 side story arcs.

  • Hours of cinematic cutscenes and interactive dialogs where your choices dictate the game’s outcome.

  • 4 main factions, with 10 units and 9 buildings each.

  • 6 mercenary factions, with 4-5 units each.

  • 14 heroes from various factions in campaign mode, or select one to lead your multiplayer games.

content_descriptors.notes: Provides a top-down representation of warfare, depicting non-realistic battles.
